CSGO is a face paced competitive shooter which smartly combines tactics and mechanical skill to create a very fun and addictive game. Even after being a game released years ago it can stand out against other games in an already competitive market.

Recently the choice by the developers to make it free to play has given more players on stricter budgets a chance to play, However this also came with the hacking scene to grow which can be a problem in any competitive game.

The game also is not very friendly towards new players and you have to just ignore the deaths and not get mad and RQ to get better at the game.
